mdRecord.dcterms:title: You are respectfully invited to attend the anniversary celebration of the Jefferson Society, to be held in the University chapel, on Saturday, the 13th of April, at 8 o'clock P.M.
Anniversary celebration
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: University of Virginia. Jefferson Society.
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 14 x 20 cm. folded to 14 x 10 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: At head of title: Anniversary celebration.
"Orator, John P. White of Abindgon, Va. Reader of the Declaration of Independence, Charles T. Friend, of Richmond, Va."
Invitation printed on p. [1] only; p. [2]-[4] are blank.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: From the Papers of the Blackford Family, MSS 5927.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia. Jefferson Society.
